metadata.title: CVE-2024-26808 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - high
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:netfilter: nft_chain_filter: handle NETDEV_UNREGISTER for inet/ingressbasechain Remove netdevice from inet/ingress basechain in caseNETDEV_UNREGISTER event is reported, otherwise a stale reference tonetdevice remains in the hook list.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
